sourcesContent:
<template>
      <select
        v-model="selectedBrand"
        class=" rounded border mr-4"
        @change="handleFilterChange"
      >
        <option value="" selected>Todos as marcas</option>
        <option
          v-for="marca in marcas"
          :key="marca.id"
          :value="marca.id"
        >
          {{ marca.nome }}
        </option>
      </select>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import marcaService from '@/services/api/marca/marcaService';
  
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        selectedBrand: '',
        marcas: [],
        loading: false
      };
    },
    methods: {
      async getAll() {
        try {
          this.loading = true;
          const response = await marcaService.getAll();
          this.marcas = response; 
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('Erro ao obter marcas:', error);
        } finally {
          this.loading = false;
        }
      },
      handleFilterChange() {
    this.$emit('brand-selected', this.selectedBrand);
  }
    
    },
    mounted() {
      this.getAll();
    }
  };
  </script>
